::Rex::

Rex frowns, lowering his gun but still ready. Chordate should really have 
informed him of this.

"Chordate," he says into his comm-link, "Did you allow someone to get into 
the ship? They've been wandering around near the bridge."

He looks at Battera. "Our leader's out at the moment. What are you doing 
waltzing around the ship? There are areas that are dangerous here."
